title: Reorg: confirmed then dropped → UNKNOWN → reconcile

scenario.notes: A tx is observed as confirmed at t1, but later evidence indicates it was dropped/reorged. The implementation must transition to UNKNOWN and reconcile (do not assume finality).

expected.verifierRule: If a receipt transitions from CONFIRMED to DROPPED/REORGED, it must become UNKNOWN and require reconcile before any retry; retries must remain idempotent by requestId.
